name: Lanturn
description: The Light Pokémon. It lives far down in the depths of the ocean. It blinds its prey with light, using the moment they’re dazzled to swallow them whole.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from electricity or electric-type attacks. Instead, half of any electric damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: This Pokémon knows the Light cantrip and can cast it at will.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.
